availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: German Hebrew congregation in Louisville, Kentucky. Established in 1842.

ab.bibl: “Kentucky,” in The Jewish Encyclopedia: A Descriptive Record of the History, Religion, Literature, and Customs of the Jewish People from the Earliest Times to the Present Day _, ed. Isidore Singer, vol. 7 (New York: Funk and Wagnalls Co, 1906), p. 467; Lee Shai Weissbach, "Kentucky Jewry During the Civil War," in _The Register of the Kentucky Historical Society, vol. 110, No. 2 (Spring 2012), pp. 165-84.
